direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods set auto-subscribe options for different types of products but share similar parameter handling and request structure.
Both methods involve subscription processes and share similar control flows and parameter checks.
Both methods interact with flexible product data, though one is for setting auto-subscribe and the other for listing products.

enhanced_by.reason: Both methods require the RequestHandler to be initialized for sending signed requests.
Both methods perform parameter checks which can throw exceptions, requiring similar exception handling in tests.
Both methods return a response string that needs to be verified for correctness.
